Richmond Aug 9 '52
To Reduce Solid Feet to Bushels, Multiply the number of solid feet by 45 & divide the product by 56; the quotient will be the number of bushels. Reason As one bushel contains 2150 2/5  inches, one solid foot is 45/36 of a bushel.  For instance a box 8 ft long 4 ft wide and 2 feet high:  8X4X2=64X45 ➗56 = 51 3/7 the number of bushels the box will contain
